title: Basic Fields
paragraph:
Each island has their own types of fields. The type of fields determines which units can be found and recruited there. All fields except special fields (e.g. {{ portals # article/fields/portal }}, {{ artifacts # article/fields/artifact }},...) are called basic fields. They all have a local skill tree to individualize each field. All basic fields are able to produce {{ soulstones # article/currencies/soulstones }} but are limited in unit recruitment. A unit can only be recruited on certain fields (with the exception of {{  Spotter Nakis # article/units/spotter-naki }}). 
 Note that different rules apply to the world type Evolution!

dynamicContents.content: Location
Grassland is a common field in the {{ starter island # article/islands/starter-island}}. Like the forest, it's found on the outer rim of the starter island.
Units
{{ Druid Nakis # article/units/druid-naki }} and {{ Grass Spirits # article/units/grass-spirit }} can be found on unclaimed grasslands. Both of the two units can be recruited there.
Location
Forest is the counterpart to the grassland and can be found on the outer rim of starter islands too.
Units
In the forest, there are Druid Nakis too, but instead of the Grass Spirits, there are {{ Forest Spirits # article/units/forest-spirit }} which can be found and recruited there.
Location
High grass is the third type of basic field on the starter islands. It's located around the portal
Units
High grass gives access to the powerful {{ Guard Nakis # article/units/guard-naki }}. But as valuable as the field is, it's harder to conquer than the grasslands and forest.
Location
The portal around the {{ magic marsh # article/islands/magic-marsh }} is surrounded by the magic forest.
Units
The magic marsh is the home of the {{ Elder Spirits # article/units/elder-spirit }}. The elder spirit is the only unit recruitable in the magic forest (besides Spotter Nakis).
Location
The swamp is outside of the magic forest in the magic marsh islands.
Units
The swamp is the only area where {{ Nyxis # article/units/nyxi }} are found. Besides the Nyxis, Elder Spirits can be recruited too in the swamp.
Location
Most of the {{ mysterious wasteland islands # article/islands/mysterious-wasteland }} are covered with wasteland.
Units

The environment in the wastelands are harsh and only strong creatures can survive there. That's why that's the home of the {{ Pangoans # article/units/pangoan}} who can be found anywhere on the island.
Location
There are three bridges connecting the sub-islands of the mysterious wasteland.
Units

There are no default option to recruit units on a bridge. However, the bridge has a local skill tree which makes it possible to recruit Spotter Nakis. And like every basic field, Soulstone mining is possible.
Location
The dunes are on the left and right outer sub-islands of the mysterious wasteland.
Units
The dunes are the home of the aggressive {{ Ranax # article/units/ranax }} as well as the Pangoans.
Location
The ash fields are dark places around the portal in the {{ dark desert island # article/islands/dark-desert }}.
Units
The powerful {{ Athlas # article/units/athlas }} unit can be found and recruited on the ash fields.
Location
Most of the dark desert island is covered with fiery desert fields.
Units
The fiery desert is the home of the Athlas but also Pangoans survive there. Both units can be recruited in that field.
